name: SAMSUNG 55 Inch UHD 4K Smart TV With Receiver
description: Experience stunning visuals with this 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV from Samsung, featuring built-in receiver and smart features for seamless streaming.

name: Dell Laptop Latitude 5530 Core i7-1255U 8GB SSD
description: High-performance Dell Latitude laptop with 12th Gen Core i7 processor, 8GB RAM, and fast SSD storage for business and personal productivity.

name: Canon EOS RP Mirrorless Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the lightweight Canon EOS RP mirrorless camera, ideal for photography enthusiasts and professionals.

name: OPPO A18 128GB 4GB Glowing Black
description: Sleek and stylish smartphone with 128GB storage, 4GB RAM, and a stunning Glowing Black finish for smooth performance and storage.

name: Samsung 27-Inch G55C Odyssey QHD 4k
description: Immerse yourself in gaming and entertainment with Samsung’s 27-inch QHD 4K curved Odyssey monitor for ultra-smooth visuals.

name: Infinix Smart (Galaxy White, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
description: A budget-friendly phone offering smooth performance with 4GB RAM and 64GB storage in a sleek Galaxy White design.

name: HP Victus Gaming Laptop 8RAM SSD
description: Game and work on-the-go with the powerful HP Victus, featuring 8GB RAM and SSD for fast, smooth gameplay and multitasking.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C Dual SIM 8GB
description: Powerful performance meets value in this Redmi 13C smartphone with 8GB RAM and dual SIM support for maximum flexibility.

name: Handheld Barcode Scanner 1D/2D/QR Code
description: Versatile barcode scanner supporting 1D, 2D, and QR codes, ideal for retail, warehouses, and office environments.

name: Large Venue building mapping Projector
description: High-brightness projector ideal for large venues and building mapping, delivering sharp and vivid projections for presentations or events.

name: Infinix Hot 40i (RAM: 4+4GB, 128GB)
description: The Infinix Hot 40i offers an extended 8GB RAM with 128GB storage, ensuring a smooth and efficient smartphone experience.

name: HP DeskJet 2710 Printer, All-in-One
description: Compact all-in-one printer from HP with printing, scanning, and copying features – ideal for home or small office use.

name: Fuzzy Logic Rice Cooker DIGITAL-JAR 1.8L 940W – HD4515/67
description: Smart rice cooker with Fuzzy Logic tech and digital control for perfectly cooked meals every time. 1.8L capacity and 940W power.

name: Sencor STS 5070SS Electric Toaster for Four Slices
description: Stylish 4-slice electric toaster with adjustable settings and stainless steel finish, ideal for quick and even toasting.

name: Infinix Smart 6 Plus (Miracle Black)
description: Affordable smartphone featuring sleek Miracle Black finish, large display, and solid performance for daily use.
